title: Little Nap Coffee Stand serves freshly roasted coffee
author: claxx moldii
caption: little nap
body: Just across from Yoyogi Park in Shibuya, youâ€™ll find Little Nap Coffee Stand, a tiny coffee shop with a few extra seats outside. It has a laid-back atmosphere and the friendly owner, Daisuke Hamada, will be more than happy to engage in conversation with visitors.
The high-quality beans are roasted on-site, and the menu includes single-origin drip coffee along with the typical espresso-based drinks, which are prepared on a Synesso machine.
